Kuroneko.name: Kuroneko
Kuroneko.desc: A haunting ghost story about loss, love, and revenge caused by the violence of men.

Sleepaway Camp.name: Sleepaway Camp
Sleepaway Camp.desc: An 80's slasher film that follows a girl to summercamp as a string of murders unravel, with a shocking ending.

The Shining.name: The Shining
The Shining.desc: A film that captures the spiraling madness and cabin fever of the Overlook Hotel caretaker.
